choices: A single father and his sons
A boy and his older sister
A family with a boy and a girl
1.content:
"Hm..." Andrew Evans grumbled while inspecting his newly concocted vial. "This'll do nicely. I could use a new nurse."

"Dr. Evans, we have another patient," Deliah the head nurse at the establishment said in her emotionless voice.

"Goody!" the doctor chirped while putting away the vial. "I have been needing some extra income lately. Tell me, who exactly is it?"
1.title: So it begins...

11.content: How many sons are there?
11.title: Lot of dudes.

choices: The Father has no idea and walks right into being a bride.
One of the boys is picked to be the bride
113.content:
Actually it was Father Mackie and his four sons or rather four alter boys.

The good father had recently become fed up with the boys behaviors and that he had caught them in various forms of mischief.

The father had taken confession with a woman that had claimed to be an old man turned young woman by the local doctor.

The father immediately compiled numerous ways that he could profit on men turned women.

It was then that he thought of his bumbling alter boys.

This was the Fathers' way of sticking it to the boys and maybe get some good maidens for his church.

Little does the Father know but the good doctor had his own plans for the Father as well as his boys.

The doctor had plans of taking a wife as well, seems it would play over better to the public eye if the doctor were married and expecting twins,,,
113.title: Four sons

choices: Would Like a Tour of the Office
12.content:
The door opened to Dr. Evan's office and a group of young boys walked in, being shown around by their guardian as he was in charge of introducing them to some of the features of this town.

"And this is the doctor's office where if you're sick at all, you can come here and the doctor, I believe his name is Dr. Evans, will get you treated and taken care of." Mr. Lancaster states.

The boys marvel at everything that they see here as Dr. Evans only uses state of the art technology and equipment.

As Dr. Evans was deciding which of the boys to make into his new nurse, he got a phone call over his personal cell phone. "Hello?" he asks.

"I heard that you can alter reality and change people to fit your needs." the person on the other end asks.

This quickly makes Dr. Evans a bit frightened that someone knows his secret. "What's it to you?" he asks.

"You see, tonight, down at Rockefeller Center, we're having the lighting of the Christmas Tree and we're short a singer. We were wondering if you could help out with that." the person responds. "We're willing to pay you quite a hefty sum for this."

Dr. Evans thinks about it as he peeks his head out of his office door and sees the boys from the orphanage in his office. "Consider it done, we can discuss the amount of money once the transformation is complete." he says before they hang up.

"Hello boys, I'm Dr. Evans, what brings you all here today?" he asks as he looks out among the boys.
12.title: A group of orphans

122.content:
"Actually Dr. Evans, I was hoping to give the boys a tour of your office if that was ok with you." Mr. Lancaster says.

This causes Dr. Evan's eyes to light up upon hearing this, knowing that he should have an opportunity to get one of the boys alone and start getting him changed for his new role in life. 'I wonder what device or method I should use.' he thinks to himself.

"That sounds wonderful, unfortunately though, I'm a bit tied up with my work at the moment, but Deliah would be more than happy to give you a tour." Dr. Evans states before his nurse comes back to join them.

"Ok, come this way with me please." she says as she leads the group down the hall while Dr. Evans ducks into his office where he has the whole place on surveillance and can see and hear everything that goes on in the building.

As the boys are getting their tour, one of them says that he has to use the bathroom. "Please let him go alone." Dr. Evans says to himself. Which of the boys has to use the restroom?
122.title: Would Like a Tour of the Office

1221.content:
"Are you sure you're ok to go by yourself?" Mr. Lancaster asks Brandon, who nods his head. "Ok then, don't take too long and come back to us, we'll be in this room." he continues before the group heads into one of the checkup rooms.

Once Brandon has gotten inside the bathroom and is separated from the group, that's when Dr. Evan's makes his move, grabbing his cholroform and rag and quickly heads into the bathroom.

Just as Brandon is finishing up washing his hands, that's when Dr. Evans makes his move, subduing him and then carrying him off to his lab. "You're going to be one gorgeous pop star once the changes are done with you." he says.

He manages to sneak Brandon into his office where he has an oxygen tank set up that once the boy breathes from it, that's what will trigger the changes. "Just what kind of pop star though do I want to make you? How about someone of various ethnicities and backgrounds, that way you'll appeal to a much wider audience?" he decides.

Once Brandon is hooked up to the oxygen, he starts to release some of it, the young boy breathing it in and already, Dr. Evans can see the changes happening as the boy is starting to get larger in size, reaching 4' tall before he disconnects it. "That should be enough, the rest of the changes will work themselves out." he says before taking Brandon back to the bathroom, setting him down on the toilet to make it look like he was having to use it.

"And let's make his friends notice the changes too, that should make things a lot more fun." he says before returning to his office.

As the tour continues, the absence of Brandon is noted and Mr. Lancaster looks over at Brian. "Could you go and check on Brandon, make sure he's alright?" he asks.
1221.title: Brandon Thomas

choices: Brian Notices Something Off About Brandon
12211.content:
Since Brandon was Brian's closest friend and was starting to get worried about him, he quickly stepped up. "Sure thing." he says as he leaves the check up room and heads towards the bathroom.

He opens the door, peeking his head inside and doesn't see Brandon anywhere. "Brandon...you in here?" he asks as he comes inside and starts looking around.

That's when he notices a pair of feet underneath one of the stalls. "Brandon, is that you in there?" He asks but again there's no response.

If he would've taken the time to keep looking down at Brandon's feet, he would've noticed that his shoes were beginning to alter, the toes becoming pointed while the sides lowered, exposing the tops of his feet while the laces and tongue vanished to make them look more like slippers. Also of note was that the color was getting lighter.

As Brian was screaming his name, Brandon slowly began to stir on the toilet seat as he realized his pants were down. 'I didn't have to do that did I? I thought it was the other type of bathroom trip.' he thinks to himself as he shakes it off and starts to pull his pants back up.

He walks out the door to see Brian standing there. "Oh hey Brian, what are you doing in here?" he asks as he looks around.

"You were in here awhile so I came in to check on you." he says.
12211.title: Yes

122111.content:
As they start leaving the bathroom, Brandon walks ahead of Brian and quickly notices that something is off with his friend. "Brandon...you look a bit taller." he says.

Brandon stops in his tracks and looks at himself and then over at Brian. "Now that you mention it, everything does seem a bit smaller, I feel like I'm closer to the ceiling than before." he says.

"Weird..." Brian sputters as they head back out to go catch up with the rest of their group. Along the way, Brandon is preoccupied with how strange his feet and shoes feel, taking a moment to look down at them which causes him to trip as they continue their change.

"You ok Brandon?" Brian asks as he goes to help his friend up.

"Yea, I think I just tripped on something." Brandon replies when he glances down to get the shock of his life as he sees that his shoes are now a silvery white and the heels have begun pushing up while his feet have enlarged to a women's size ten.

"Brandon, what's happened to your shoes?" Brian asks to which Brandon just shrugs his shoulders.

"I don't know, but we should get back to Mr. Lancaster and see if we can get back to the orphanage so I can get another pair." he states, still stumbling along as the heels of his shoes reach 3" tall.
122111.title: Brian Notices Something Off About Brandon

1221111.content:
It's not much longer when the two of them finally manage to find the rest of the group as they're coming out of the checkup room. "Ah good, glad you found him and he seems to be doing ok." Mr. Lancaster says as he motions for Brandon and Brian to rejoin them.

Brian notices how Brandon keeps stumbling as he walks as the heels of his shoes finally stop growing at 5" tall, really putting his height at a boost. His age had also started getting higher, reaching 14 years old. "Is something the matter Brandon?" he asks.

Brandon looks down at his feet. "I don't know why but my shoes feel weird." he says as he glances down to see that his former tennis shoes are now a pair of silvery white 5" high heels. "What happened to my shoes? Why am I wearing ladies shoes?" he asks aloud.

His distress was loud enough for Mr. Lancaster and the rest of the boys to hear as they made their way over towards him to see what was going on. "I don't see anything wrong with your shoes Brandon, those are the same ones that you had put on when we left the orphanage." Mr. Lancaster states.

Richie, one of the other boys, is shocked by what Mr. Lancaster just said. "No way, I saw him putting on those black tennis shoes earlier." he says.

"I don't know what kind of jokes you boys are trying to play, but if you keep it up, we're gonna cut this tour short and send you back to the orphanage." he says to which all the boys quickly quiet down. "That's better."

With that, Deliah starts leading the group towards the operating room and along the way, more changes happen to Brandon as he feels his phone starting to push out the back of his pants and quickly takes it out to be more comfortable.
1221111.title: Finding the Group

12211111.content:
Once they get to the operating room and Deliah starts going on about what types of procedures are done in here, none of the boys are paying attention, instead focused on their friend Brandon, watching as his changes continue.

By now, his pant legs have begun to pool at his feet, turning a silvery white, just like his high heels. His legs themselves have begun to reshape and become more toned, sleek, and longer, mainly in the calves for now.

"What could have caused this?" Richie asks as he looks over his friend, feeling really distressed over what's happening and finding it incredibly odd that none of the adults seem to notice anything wrong with him.

When they finally finished the tour of the office, they started heading back towards the lobby when one of the boys noticed another door. "Hey where does this go?" Ryan asks as he starts to head over towards it when Deliah stops him.

"That's off limits, only for the doctor." she says sternly.

Ryan quickly backs away, not wanting to get into trouble and then shrugs his shoulders. "Oh well." he sputters.

Just before they leave though, Dr. Evans comes back out to see them off. "Thanks for coming in today but I was wondering if you boys wanted to get your checkups done, free of charge?" he asks. Before anyone can give an answer, Brandon's phone screen starts to vanish as the material of it begins to morph to a black leather and getting bigger.
12211111.title: Operating Room

122111111.content:
Ryan worked up the courage to raise his hand. "I believe I could use a checkup, sir."

The doctor gave a look of surprise that quickly turned into one of great interest. "Well then, I'm sure the rest of your friends would be willing to wait a few more minutes for you, would they?" The other orphans and their guardian shook their heads and allowed the small child to be taken away.

As the strange doctor and the six year old walked over to the doctor's office, Evans couldn't help but ask why Ryan would want a checkup. "To tell the truth, I think I might be seeing things," the boy confessed. "Brandon is really looking weird."

"Well, that's just how puberty works I guess," the man chuckled as he opened the door to his office.

"Whet-erty?"

"Nothing. To be honest, your symptoms are rather common for this time of the year. A simple flu shot should do you good. Are you doing anything this Wednesday?"

"What, for Christmas? No, just the usual single present the orphanage gives us."

"Ah." Evans brought out a large vial with a green fluid inside of it. "Don't worry, I'm sure you'll get plenty of presents this year." He grinned at his reflection on the glass tube. "I could certainly see you gaining plenty of family."

"You really think so?" Ryan chirped with a cherub smile.

"Of course~" the doctor responded while presenting his vial. "Now hold still, this'll only be a pinch." He then inserted the needle into the boy's arm and injected the liquid. "Well, that's it. I hope you'll see me again."

"Thank you, mister Evans!" the boy cheered while heading towards the door to return to his friends. "Do I get a lollipop?"

"No, I'm afraid we're out of them at the moment."

"Darn." Ryan then closed the door and made his way back to the entrance. Little did he notice his tattered old Sketchers turning into a brand new pair of leather black high-heels.
122111111.title: Sure

1221111111.content:
Once Ryan had returned to the group, they were finally ready to go. However, Brandon, Richie, and Brian noticed something was odd about him. "He looks a little taller too." Richie says as Brandon starts fearing the worst.

He glances down at Ryan's feet and is shocked to see the high heels the boy is now sporting. "Ryan, now you're changing too." he sputters.

Ryan has a look of confusion on his face as he looks down and is shocked when he sees his own new high heels. "Just what is happening to us?" he asks.

The changes haven't abated on Brandon either as the silvery white color continues to creep up his pants as at his feet, the pant legs begin merging and that too starts climbing upwards, reaching his knees for now. Where the pants had merged, there was some glittering diamonds appearing.

His thighs now were getting into their changes as those began to swell out and get curvier and thicker, really pushing out his pants which were now clinging tightly to him.

"Come on boys, knock this off and get back on the bus." Mr. Lancaster says as he leads the boys back on the bus.
1221111111.title: Regrouping

12211111111.content:
All the boys got back on the bus with Ryan and Brandon sitting next to each other as usual. However, the two seemed less comfortable together than before. They constantly kept glancing at each other, looking for something that was off. Eventually, though, Ryan decided to break the heat.

"So, have you noticed anything weird, Brandon?" he asked his friend.

"Uh...I don't think so..." Brandon answered reluctantly. "Why, have you?"

"I'm not sure..." his friend replied similarly. "Although, my feet do feel kinda cold." Little did he notice the tip of his new heels disappearing, leaving his enlarged feet to gain more air. Two of his toes were left in the open, each of them now painted with a gold nail polish. His legs also began to grow as well, along with the rest of his body. By now, he looked more like a sixteen year old by now.

It wasn't until Ryan felt a small prick where his shot was taken that he noticed his enlarged muscles and overall body. This was followed by a surprisingly high-pitched scream.

"Brandon, what happened to me?!" he cried out in a womanish voice.
12211111111.title: The Bus Ride

122111111111.content:
Brandon breathes a sigh of relief when he sees how Ryan is reacting to his changes. "Good, I thought you hadn't noticed like that doctor and nurse and Mr. Lancaster." he says as he takes in his friend's latest changes.

"So what do you think could have caused this to happen to us?" Ryan asks.

"I wish I knew but I'm just as stumped as you are." he replies as he feels a pressure starting to build up in his hips. "Ouch." he sputters as he has to lean over in his seat.

His hips had started pushing outwards, gaining inches to them until they were about 30" wide but certainly not stopping there. By now the silvery whitish coloring had reached the top of his pants and the connecting of the pant legs was at his thighs where more of the diamonds were appearing on it.

"Brandon, it looks like you're going to end up in a skirt." Brian says.

"Great, that's just what I want." he replies as the bus finally moves off away from the doctor's office.

"So now what are we going to do?" Ryan asks as he sees the phone that Brandon has on his lap has finished growing into a black leather purse. On the inside of it is a driver's license for the state of New York under the name of Branda Thomey.
122111111111.title: Brandon doesn't know

1221111111111.content:
Luckily for them, it wasn't long before the bus arrived at the orphanage. Brandon, Brian, and Ryan all ran out of their vehicle and into the building, hoping to find out was exactly was going on. While they were running, Ryan couldn't help but feel as if something on his head was bouncing. Upon further inspection, he found out that his hair was growing at an exponential rate. It was was already gaining more volume than even the average woman and was already reaching his neck.

"Okay, this is just wrong," Ryan said in a solemn woman's voice. "I think I'm turning into a girl."

"I think I am, too," Brandon said as well. They eventually reached their beds and huddled around Brandon's. However, they found that all the valuables the boy usually kept there were missing. Not a single book, candy stash, or piece of clothing remained.

"I think someone just stole your stuff, Brandon!" Brian shouted to his friend. His friend didn't respond, instead choosing to stare at Ryan as he saw the boy's red shirt merge with his shorts, becoming what was essentially a dress.

"Guys, this feels weird!" Ryan shouted as he felt his new garment. Little did he see his Spongebob underwear morphing into a black thong. He saw it afterwards, though. "Guys, I have lady underwear!"
1221111111111.title: Returning to the Orphanage

choices: They Try to Get Out of it
12211111111111.content:
"This can't be happening, there has to be something here that's still mine." Branda says as he keeps looking around the bed, under the bed, and even in the dresser that was directly across the room from it. "Crap, there's nothing here...wait a minute." he says as he opens up the top drawer. "I found something." he says.

Turns out though it wasn't much, just some loose articles of clothing and a pair of black cotton gloves to keep his hands warm during the winter season which they were in at the moment. "These should at least help me stay warm if we go back out." he states, sliding them on.

However, his changes still had no desire to stop as by now his former pants were now a silvery white skirt, the entire thing adorned by those shiny jewels.

"Whoever you're becoming must be rich since that skirt looks really expensive." Brian states as he feels the soft, silk material that his friend's pants had become.

"That might not be so bad, but I don't want to be a girl either." Branda sputters.

Branda's hips continued their growth before finally stopping at 37" wide and his ass was sticking out now, looking very fleshy, tight, and toned and it looked like his skirt was so tight, it showed off his new curves nicely although he still had some to gain.

It was at that moment Mr. Lancaster came into the room to address the boys. "Great news boys, we've been invited to attend the lighting of the Christmas tree in Rockefeller Center!"
12211111111111.title: Brandon finds something

122111111111112.content:
"Dude, don't you see what's going on," Ryan tried to reason. "The Christmas tree thing is a thing for rich people and Branda's turning into a rich girl. We can't go, it'll only make things worse!"

"Maybe you're right..." Branda considered. "But it's not like Mr. Lancaster will just make an exception of us. We'll be forced to go!"

Ryan was about to retort, but then he noticed something shiny on his own bed. In a daze, he walked over to it and held it up. What he found was a black purse with a golden clutch and a long strap. Before questioning its sudden appearance, he decided to open it to find its contents.

As the boy/teenager rummaged through the purse, his hands continued to change into dainty, feminine ones covered with much longer nails. What he found inhis rummaging was little more than a bag of cough drops, an iPhone 5, and a wallet. As interesting as the two other items were, Ryan decided to look through the wallet first. Within the wallet was a driver's licence with his picture and information similar to his own. The only problem was that his name was listed as 'Ryel Wilsich', a major difference from his Wilson heritage, and his age listed at twenty.

"Oh my God, Ryel, you grew again!" Brian called out. Ryel looked down at himself and felt little difference with his age, especially considering his height was hadn't increased from 5'7''. Before he could even get a comment out, he noticed a new shiny object in the purse.

"Look!" he called out while showing the thing that he had found. "I have car keys! We can just drive somewhere else!"
122111111111112.title: They Try to Get Out of it

1221111111111122.content:
"I don't think that would be a good idea Ryan. Do you even know how to drive?" Branda responds to this latest discovery. "And besides, how are you supposed to even know what car is yours." he continues as Ryan starts to see the futility in his plan.

"I think our best option would try to go to the lighting ceremony. Maybe we'll find some more clues there." Brian suggests to which the other boys agree to, albeit reluctantly.

"I don't like this any more than you do Ryan, but this may be our best shot." Branda says as he feels like his stomach and waist are being crushed which causes him to sit back down on his bed. "This really hurts." he sputters out in a painful tone.

His stomach was getting washboard flat, although he'd never be able to develop a six pack. His waist, which had grown with him as he got taller and older, suddenly decided to go the opposite way, getting down to 26" wide which really offset and helped accentuate how curvy his lower half is.

"Go and tell Mr. Lancaster we're ready to go whenever." Branda states as he decides to go through his own purse to find anymore clues and notices that on his driver's license, his name has shifted further to Maranda Chomey and his age had climbed up to 25.

His clothes weren't spared any changes either as now his shirt was now stuck to his skirt, and no matter how hard he tried, there was no way to separate the two garments as the silvery whitish color began bleeding into his blue shirt. Which of the boys goes and gets Mr. Lancaster?
1221111111111122.title: Brandon has another idea

12211111111111221.content:
"I'll go..." Ryel said defeated. "Dang it, and I really wanted to drive." He walked out of the room and down the halls to reach Mr. Lancaster's office.

In his disappointment, the new adult look down at his new dress as he saw its redness start to turn gold and its material to change drastically. What was once a cheap fabric gave way to a rough, shiny fabric that shined beautifully as if showing its expense to the world. Ryel started to scratch his arm as his sleeves also turned to a material that he could only identify as pantyhose in nature.

He let out a dejected sigh as he opened the door to his guardian's office. He was greeted with the usual smile and programmed greeting and finally worked up the nerve to talk to the man.

"Mr. Lancaster..." Ryel hesitated. "I...we're...I don't know what's going on!" he shouted, followed quickly by sobbing. He sat down in one of the man's chairs and put his hands over his eyes. As he did so, makeup appeared all over his face that didn't deteriorate at all from his tears. Mascara showed off his now elongated eyelashes, blush allowed his relocated cheeks to shine, and lipstick caused his newly curled lips to shine. By now, his face was almost indistinguishable of a woman's.

"What's wrong, Ryel?" Mr. Lancaster asked worried while putting a hand on the sobbing adult's shoulder.

"Mr. Lancaster...something's happening to me," he confessed. "Do you know who I am?"

What does he think Ryel is now?
12211111111111221.title: Ryan

choices: Maranda Speaks up and Says Limo
122111111111112212.content:
Mr. Lancaster is confused by the distress being shown by Ryel. "Of course I know who you are, you're Ryel Wilsich and one of the richest people in the state. In fact if it wasn't for you and your generous donations, we wouldn't have this wonderful orphanage." he says as Ryel just looks on with shock.

"Come on, let's go get the boys and we'll start heading down to the Rockefeller Center." he says as he helps Ryel out of his seat and takes him down to the living quarters.

"I wonder what's taking Ryan so long." Brian says when he hears the sound of high heels click clacking towards the door and all the boys' eyes go wide when they see Ryan's altered face.

"Ryan totally looks like a woman." Richie whispers to Maranda who gulps, knowing that's going to be his fate soon if something doesn't happen.

His own changes kept progressing as his entire shirt was now engulfed by that silvery white color, the material shifting completely to an expensive silk as more diamonds appeared on it but strangely enough, it seemed to stop right at the bottom of his chest. The confusion for that ended when he saw that the parts that weren't covered by that material instantly vanished, exposing the top of his chest and showing that his new dress was being held up by straps. His sleeves though then began extending down his arms, reaching his elbows for now.

He felt a tingling at his hands and glanced down and saw that his now completely feminine hands had long nails that sported a manicure.

"So do you boys want to take the bus down there, or ride in the limos that Ryel was nice enough to provide for us.
122111111111112212.title: Something else

1221111111111122122.content:
Normally, the boys would want to take the bus since driving that would make things feel a lot more normal than they currently are, but Maranda steps up and says something that shocks everyone. "Actually, I think it would be more fun to take the limos." he says before coughing as his voice starts getting higher in pitch.

"Alright then it looks like we'll be taking the limos." Mr. Lancaster says as he starts heading out to the front part of the orphanage while the other boys pull Maranda aside.

"What was that all about? I thought all of us agreed that we were gonna take the bus and not these stupid limos." Richie states.

Maranda puts his hand on his head as he feels a bit of a migraine coming on. "I don't know, its just...its just...I feel more comfortable and at home in a limo instead of that dingy bus." he says, much to the shock and awe of his fellow orphans.

It was at that point that the sleeves connected with the gloves he had put on earlier as the material of them shifts to a silky white, forming a pair of bicep-length white gloves and a large diamond bracelet appeared on his left wrist.

"Well, it looks like there's nothing we can do except take the limos." Ryel states with a sigh as the group starts heading out towards those.

"I'm really sorry." Maranda says as his voice finishes altering into that of an adult woman's as his age climbs up to 30 years old. One thing though that really bothers the other boys is that he's moving a bit easier in his 5" high heels. He doesn't have that seductive sway yet, but that will come in due time.
1221111111111122122.title: Maranda Speaks up and Says Limo

12211111111111221221.content:
They soon arrived outside where a whole group of limos were lined up with various children getting into each. One in particular had a middle-aged man with a formal suit. "I take it you and your guests are ready, Mis...ter Wilsich?" he asked Ryel.

"Of course, Benson," he thanked with a large smile. "Wait, how did I know your name?"

"Well, I have been you main chauffeur for a good twenty-five years, Ryel," he chuckled, taking the question as a joke. "Now come, we don't have long to make it to the event."

"T-twenty-five years?" Ryel stuttered as he felt his skin tense again. It started to age some more, looking more like that of a forty year old, its firmness beginning deteriorate. Even on his face, you could begin to see wrinkles forming, luckily hidden by the well-applied makeup. His age wasn't the only thing to change about his appearance, as his dress gained what looked like a jacket around his arms, though it was all seamed into the material.

"Right..." Maranda said while pushing Ryel while he was in his shocked state. The group got into the limo and were absolutely amazed at the interior. There were bottled waters, tiny TVs, about a dozen cup holders, and plenty of other stuff they'd never expect to see in such a vehicle! Although, Miranda and Ryel seemed rather unfazed.

"Do you even know where we're going to?" Maranda asked his also changing friend.

"You mean you forgot about the charity event?" he asked back as if it was the most obvious thing in the world.

What is Maranda's response?
12211111111111221221.title: Getting in the Limos

choices: Maradah Gets Taken Away as Soon as He Gets Out
122111111111112212211.content:
"Oh yea that's right, the Christmas Tree lighting. How could I forget that?" Maranda replies to which Richie and Brian quickly try to snap him out of.

"The only reason you know that is because that's where Mr. Lancaster said that we were going remember?" Richie asks.

There seems to be some sort of confusion building up in Maranda's subconscious as he responds. "Yes he did mention it, but for some reason it felt like I was already planning on being there regardless." he responds.

"This isn't good, something is really going wrong with the two of them." Brian whispers to Richie.

Inside of Maranda's purse, his driver's license information is altering further, now showing his name to be Maradah Carohmey. And it was at that point he felt his face starting to shift, and the boys could see it twitching as he sat there.

"You ok Brandon?" Brian asks as he sees the distress his friend is under.

"Yea I'm fine, I just need to look at myself." he says as he pulls a small hand mirror out of his purse. He watches as his face starts to shift, the shape of it becoming more ovalish while his cheekbones rise up higher on his face. His lips start to get puffier and poutier while the top curves upwards to give them a cupid's bow shape. As he was looking at himself, the boys quickly noticed how his sitting position had changed as he had now his right leg draped over his left in a very feminine manner.

And it wasn't long before they arrived at the Christmas tree lighting ceremony.
122111111111112212211.title: "Oh yeah...."

1221111111111122122111.content:
Once they finally got there, Ryel and the rest of the boys got out first with Maradah getting out of the limo last. And almost as soon as his heels hit the pavement, he was quickly swarmed by several people who were in charge of the event.

"Maradah, we were wondering what was taking you so long. We know how much you wanted to spend time with the children at the new orphanage, but we're really tight on time and need to get you backstage and prepared for your performance." one of them says as they lead him away from the rest of the group.

"Brandon come back!" Brian shouts, but with everything going on, it's too loud for him to hear. But what's most startling is the fact that Maradah seems to almost go with them willingly and him, Ryel, and Richie notice that Maradah is really walking with a seductive sway to his hips, those swinging back and forth while his plump ass shimmies and shakes. "Not good." Brian sputters.

Maradah though is still a bit concerned about his friends and turns around to get a look at them, giving them the opportunity to see his face finishing up as his nose becomes smaller and his eyes wider and more inviting while the irises darken to a very dark brown and his lashes get longer, thicker, and curlier and seem to flutter when he blinks when that's all topped off with makeup appearing on his face.

And once he turns around, that's when they see his hair getting longer and turning a darker color, going from it's normally bright blonde to a darker, almost brownish blonde color before spilling over his shoulders, past his armpits where it takes on a more curly/wavy appearance. And it's at that point when he's finally out of sight from the rest of the group, just after a pair of dangly earrings appear in his ears as his age climbs to 35 years old.

info.brief_description: Dr. Evans is a genius that has come up with a way to turn his patients into rich clients.
info.description:
Dr. Andrew Evans has a foolproof plan to become rich with minimal work on his part. Utilizing his own unique style of reality-altering magic and science, the physician has found a way to turn any of his free patients into wealthy clients. Through a simple syringe, he can get a secretary. With a puny pill, he can get a Playboy Bunny. A brief use of oxygen could get him an heiress. It doesn't matter of the patient's age or gender, he could have them become whatever he wants, although he does prefer female clients...

What shall follow is a barrage of TG sequences of all kinds. TG, AP, AR, RC, MC, ETC. Changes can be as fast or as slow as you want. Whatever twists, turns, or twists you may want is up to you to decide! Just add responsibly. :)

Here are the rules:

1. Keep it PG-13!
2. I'm not too up for sexual content, but I'll be fine as long as long as it's not in too much description and every chapter.
3. Keep language PG-13 and also keep it tame (like not cursing every sentence)
4. Keep the story going if you can.
5. Remember the rules.
